roleset.name: utterly depressed

example.name: both args
example.text: I 'm really rather despondent about the state of urban public education , and it seems like nobody really has any idea how to fix it .
example.arg: about the state of urban public education

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, despair-v.01, which corresponds to VNcls marvel-31.3-6. Would relate to 'despond-v' if it existed, which would certainly be patterned like 'despair.01'.
